text: Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

But as the power grows, they realize that it's not a dream.

When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. At first, they don't believe that it's happening. But as the power grows, they realize that it's not a dream. An ancient capability has taken root in the human beings who once didn't even believe in magic, or the supernatural. Soon, people begin experimenting with their power. They want to know what it can really do.

Schools of thought quickly form and people begin sharing information. As new abilities are identified, people begin organizing into teams, based on the level of power they have in different areas of magic. The most powerful of these teams, the Order, is led by the most powerful of all humans, the Mage. The Mage insists that humans must wage war on the alien invaders. And the Order is determined to do just that.

The Mage sends envoys in all directions, to begin a dialogue with other groups. His message to surrounding groups is that war is upon us all. Everyone must fight. He requests that they begin to deliver the message to groups further away from The Order. Soon, everyone on earth is aware of the imminent battle. People are scared, but they are also hopeful.
